body_html:
I should mention that I am observing the SEGFAULT issue with a macOS+GPU build. As macOS+GPU isn't officially supported, the SEGFAULT issue might not be a problem with officially-supported build configurations.

Can someone try out the modified test case on, say, Linux+GPU, and see if there is a SEGFAULT issue?

body:
I should mention that I am observing the SEGFAULT issue with a macOS+GPU build. As macOS+GPU isn't officially supported, the SEGFAULT issue might not be a problem with officially-supported build configurations.

Can someone try out the modified test case on, say, Linux+GPU, and see if there is a SEGFAULT issue?
